name: DearS (4)
summary: Althouh the Dears Headquarters was trying to take Ren away from Takeya, he was able to hamper their efforts. But one day Takeya was called by Khi, the Dears care-taker. At the time Ren was asked out by Nonaka, the class's number one playboy.
